name: skillink
description: Symlink skills from .agents/skills/ to all AI coding agents

scripts.build: bun build src/cli.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm && mv dist/cli.js dist/cli.mjs && chmod +x dist/cli.mjs
scripts.release:patch: bun run build && npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: bun run build && npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags

author: Ian <https://github.com/ianchenx>
